===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} A type of refined iron, which was known for its hardness. It was often used in the making of sword blades.

===Usage notes===
'''鑌鐵''' was probably a type of [[carbon steel]]. Some have claimed that '''鑌鐵''' was actually [[w:Damascus steel|Damascus steel]] ([[w:Wootz steel|Wootz steel]]), however there is [[insufficient]] [[archaeological]] evidence to support this.
